üåü Update Alert! üöÄ

I've been tinkering with WatchPost again! For the tech enthusiasts out there, I've streamlined the workflow to be even more efficient. Here's a breakdown of the latest changes:

‚û°Ô∏è Removed unnecessary "Find First Commit" step to simplify the process.
‚û°Ô∏è Improved the Git Diff step to directly check for the FIRST_COMMIT environment variable.
‚û°Ô∏è Enhanced the Commit and Push Changes step to utilize the FIRST_COMMIT environment variable seamlessly.

Exciting stuff happening behind the scenes! Stay tuned for more updates on WatchPost! üî•

Check out the project on GitHub: https://github.com/rohittp0/WatchPost

#GitHub #Automation #WatchPost #LinkedInAutomation
